Title: Provides for the allocation of monies for dental health services in the medicaid managed care program, the child health insurance program and the family health plus program
Summary: Provides for the allocation of monies for dental health services in the medicaid managed care program, the child health insurance program and the family health plus program.
LawCode: Amd ยง2511, Pub Health L; amd ยง364-j, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the social services law, in relation to allocating monies for dental health services in the medicaid managed care program, the child health insurance program, and the family health plus program
